main event: A civilian in Madison, Connecticut reported observing a small, bright, white light that performed a 90-degree turn and flew directly away from the observer.
interesting points: The object was observed for 30 seconds before performing a 90-degree turn and disappearing.
The report was from 27th December 1953 at 04:35 Zulu time.
No physical evidence or photographs were included in the report.
The object was described as a single bright white light with no indication of its size or shape.
The source of the report was a civilian witness.
